nodes.text: By around 2 ABY, the Rebel Alliance's Thirty-Second Infantry was obliterated. The event resulted in the death of over 400 of the infantry group. Among the five survivors of the Thirty-Second was the grenadier Maximian Ajax, who joined the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry after, continuing to wear the patch of his former unit, until his death during a mission in 3 ABY.
The obliteration of the Thirty-Second Infantry was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
